content: this is a soft and cozy blanket made to wrap around that new baby and snuggle ***errata*** on row 16 the pattern should read k5 *p4 k1 p1 ***k4*** repeat from * to marker k5 work the 24 row stitch pattern a *total* of 8 times all copies downloaded after 2 12 16 will contain these correct instructions worked in worsted weight yarn on a slightly larger needle makes it nice and soft the blanket can be made with any size yarn depending on the finished size desired yardage and gauge is given for worsted weight yarn to make the size stated work in dk weight yarn and needles appropriate for the yarn and blanket will use approximately 750 yards and measure approximately 29-30 square after blocking finished measurements approximately 32 x 32 81 5 x 81 5 cm materials worsted weight yarn cyca 4 approx 820 yds sample used paton s canadiana 3½ oz/100 g 205 yd/187 m 100% acrylic 4 balls 10615 cherished yellow us size 9 5 5 mm 24 61 cm circular needles or size to obtain correct gauge gauge 18 sts and 24 row = 4 10 cm in stockinette stitch
